name: Infernal Machine of Fright
flavorText: Clashing gears and foul magic grind away within this cursed construct. Its malevolent passage can only be unleashed inside a house of the damned.

description:
Opens a portal to The Realm of Fright.
Use inside a tainted abode hidden within New Tristram. (Torment Only)
